title: Hopkins 47345 4 Wire Flat Adapter
description: As the number one brand in towing electrical products, Hopkins Towing Solutions has provided consumers with innovation, durability, and performance for over twenty years. Hopkins' Plug-In Simple Adapters take the guesswork out of vehicle-to-trailer wiring. Pre-wired adapters allow the consumer to create a custom Plug-In Simple wiring system appropriate for any towing situation.
